trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.

The FormsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Dostęp można uzyskać <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>zdarzenie <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>klasy, określając procedury o nazwie **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** w pliku Global.asax aplikacji ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>Tworzy <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>przy użyciu bieżącej <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>i przekazuje je do **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzeń.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Można użyć <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>Właściwość <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>obiekt dostarczony do **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzeń, aby ustawić <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>właściwości bieżącego <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>do niestandardowego <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli nie określisz wartości <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>właściwości podczas **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzenie, tożsamość dostarczonych przez biletu uwierzytelniania formularzy w pliku cookie lub adres URL jest używany.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** zdarzenie tylko jest wywoływane, gdy uwierzytelnianie <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>ma ustawioną wartość <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>i <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>jest moduł HTTP dla aplikacji.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
